attributes.action: stop st.ninians pupils to pay for homework diaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think st.ninians pupils shouldnt pay for homework diaries because every other school thats in East Renfrewshire dont have to pay for their homework diaries.

rejection.details: Please raise this issue with the school in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
